generated_body: The article titled "Justice Dept. rolls out new program to combat gun violence" is likely to provide an overview of a recently launched initiative by the Justice Department aimed at addressing gun violence across the country. Readers may expect details on the program's objectives, key components, and the strategies intended to reduce gun-related incidents. It could also discuss how this initiative fits into broader national efforts to tackle crime and enhance public safety. Additionally, the article may feature insights from officials or experts on the potential effectiveness of this program in curbing gun violence.
